Row.Text: All newly-trained non-air Units in this City receive the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Drill I[ENDCOLOR] Promotion, improving [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength when fighting in [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]ROUGH[ENDCOLOR] Terrain. Provides a free Constabulary in the City in which it is built. Boosts City [ICON_CULTURE] Culture output by 20%.
